Sentencas: For the three-phase identification of solid oxide cuel cell (SOFC) electrode, this paper presents a novel segmentation method based on gaussian mixture model (GMM) for YSZ/Ni anode optical microscopy (OM) images.
Titulo: A Novel Ni/YSZ Anode Image Segmentation Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes Microstructure

Sentencas: A coarseness-entropy adaptive factor is defined to incorporate the spatial information based on markov random field (MRF) into GMM.
Titulo: A Novel Ni/YSZ Anode Image Segmentation Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes Microstructure

Sentencas: Furthermore, the proposed method can obtain the trade-off between robustness to noise and effectiveness of preserving the details.
Titulo: A Novel Ni/YSZ Anode Image Segmentation Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes Microstructure

Sentencas: Experimental results show that the proposed method outperforms the compared method on three-phase microstructure identification.
Titulo: A Novel Ni/YSZ Anode Image Segmentation Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes Microstructure

Sentencas: It can provide reliable foundation for the quantification of SOFC microstructure parameters.
Titulo: A Novel Ni/YSZ Anode Image Segmentation Method for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes Microstructure
